title: Changing audio settings in Unity 5 with public API

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • The docs state that in Unity 5 you can no longer set the speakerMode via API, but instead must use project settings->audio to set this

sections.title: Resolution
content: In Unity 5, if you want to change the AudioSettings, the new API must be used:

AudioConfiguration _audioConfig = AudioSettings.GetConfiguration ();
        _audioConfig.speakerMode = AudioSettings.driverCapabilities;
        AudioSettings.Reset (_audioConfig);

sections.title: More Informationhttp://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/AudioSettings.GetConfiguration.htmlhttp://docs.unity3d.com/ScriptReference/AudioSettings.Reset.html
content: This article applies to Unity versions 5.0+
